means: 无家可归的人( waif的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: There are lots of waifs and strays living on the streets here.
sentence.Network_cn: 这里有很多露宿街头的无家可归者.

sentence.Network_en: My wife is always inviting various waifs and strays from work to our house. She seems to attract them.
sentence.Network_cn: 我妻子总是邀请公司里各种各样的单身男女到家中作客, 他们很愿意和她交往.

sentence.Network_en: She was like a mother to the poor waifs.
sentence.Network_cn: 她象母亲一样对待那些可怜的流浪儿童.

list.abs: a woman who sports this emaciated , skeletal physique is called a waif , which is a thin person who appears fragile and needy .瘦骨嶙峋的女人被称为细挑个儿，看上去弱不禁风。
constructing a new pattern of waif relief system ., 构建新型流浪儿童救助体系研究.
A waif is begging on the street ., 街上有一个流浪儿正在乞讨.
Two young waifs steals a pair of boots ., 两个年轻的流浪者偷一双长筒靴.

entry.tran: 极瘦弱的人；无家可归者;流浪儿
entry.def: If you refer to a child or young woman as a waif, you mean that they are very thin and look as if they have nowhere to live.

example.ex: ...a dirty-faced waif of some five or six years...
example.tran: 五六岁大、脸上脏兮兮的流浪儿

example.ex: The director wants a waif-like, teenage girl with long, dark hair for the role.
example.tran: 导演想要一个留着乌黑的长发、面黄肌瘦的十来岁女孩扮演这个角色。

auth_sentence.content: All the poor waifs...without even shoes or a penny pie.
auth_sentence.res_content: All the poor waifs...without even shoes or a penny pie.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: All the poor waifs...without even shoes or a penny pie.

auth_sentence.content: Those waifs and strays of the intelligentsia who had refused to participate in the war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those waifs and strays of the intelligentsia who had refused to participate in the war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those waifs and strays of the intelligentsia who had refused to participate in the war.

auth_sentence.content: "Girl With No Eyes" has the necessary chorus of pathetic waifs chanting a nursery rhyme.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Girl With No Eyes" has the necessary chorus of pathetic waifs chanting a nursery rhyme.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Girl With No Eyes" has the necessary chorus of pathetic waifs chanting a nursery rhyme.
